username.label: Username
username.help: Username to be used for authentication.

password.label: Password
password.help: Password to be used for authentication.

licenseKey.label: License key
licenseKey.help: The license key used for request metering, or possible authorization purpose (limit API client itself, not the Control Center user).

endpoint.label: Endpoint
endpoint.help: (Optional) Jasper API Endpoint to be used. Default: https://api.jasperwireless.com
